attributes.action: To allow the petitioners to have the option to use a different form of identification when they sign up to a petition; to keep the petitioner's real identity confidential from the general public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow the petitioners to have the option to use a different form of identification when they sign up to a petition; eg. a code number or code letters or a combination of both, or a screen name - either made up by the petitioner or designated to them. In order to keep a petitioner's real identity confidential from the general public. Once a screen name or screen identification was chosen by, or designated to, the petitioner, they could keep the same one for all the petitions that they signed up to.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
